title: The Voice host Delta Goodrem seen a date with beau Matthew Copley
text:
She's been dating musician Matthew Copley for almost two years.

And Delta Goodrem couldn't hide her iconic smile when she stepped out for breakfast in Sydney with her rocker beau on Thursday.

The 34-year-old wowed in a black jumpsuit with a plunging neckline that revealed a glimpse of her lacy black bra.

All smiles: Delta Goodrem couldn't hide her iconic smile when she stepped out for breakfast in Sydney with her rocker beau Matthew Copley on Thursday

She trotted along in Balenciaga slides and a denim jacket wrapped around her shoulders as Matthew gently placed his arm around her.

Matthew wore his usual beachy style with a light blue denim shirt and stylish grey trousers.

In a rather cute detail, the singer seemed to be wearing the same set of sunglasses as Delta has previously pictured wearing.

The pair sat down for breakfast at the Kawa Cafe in inner city Sydney and quenched their thirst with smoothies.

She trotted along in Balenciaga sandals and a denim jacket wrapped around her shoulders as Matthew gently placed his arm around her

They first debuted their romance in January last year and have shared a quiet but steady relationship.

She has plenty of reason to smile as well after Channel Nine announced she and Boy George, Guy Sebastian and Kelly Rowland would all be returning for the 2020 season of The Voice.

'Our Coaches are back and ready to find Australia's next Massive Voice,' they captioned a post on Instagram on Wednesday.

Sshh! Delta rarely speaks about her relationship with Matthew, whom she has been dating since late 2017, and prefers to keep her personal life out of the headlines

The announcement comes after rumours the foursome had been playing 'hardball' for more pay and even threatened to quit if they weren't handed more cash.

'Channel Nine are keen to have exactly the same coach panel as this year, as they think it is the perfect line-up, especially with Guy being the standout coach with audiences this year,' a source told New Idea.

'Nine wanted to sign them up for next year before this year's series ended. But the feisty coaches are playing hardball.
description: She's been dating musician Matthew Copley for almost two years.
authors: Tom Place For Daily Mail Australia
